title: Design new user onboarding flow
description: Create wireframes and prototypes for the new user onboarding experience, focusing on reducing time to first value and improving user activation rates.

title: Implement API rate limiting
description: Add rate limiting middleware to protect API endpoints from abuse and ensure fair usage across all clients.

title: Write unit tests for authentication module
description: Comprehensive test coverage for user authentication, including login, logout, token refresh, and password reset functionality.

title: Update documentation for v2.0 API
description: Revise API documentation to reflect new endpoints, updated request/response formats, and deprecation notices for v1.0.

title: Fix mobile responsive issues on dashboard
description: Address layout problems on mobile devices, particularly with the sidebar navigation and chart components.

title: Set up CI/CD pipeline for staging environment
description: Configure automated deployment pipeline for staging environment with proper testing and rollback mechanisms.

title: Conduct user research interviews
description: Schedule and conduct 10 user interviews to gather feedback on the new feature set and identify pain points.

title: Optimize database queries for reports page
description: Identify and optimize slow database queries affecting the reports page performance, targeting sub-2-second load times.

title: Create marketing landing page
description: Design and develop a conversion-focused landing page for the upcoming product launch campaign.

title: Security audit of user data handling
description: Comprehensive review of data collection, storage, and processing practices to ensure GDPR compliance and security best practices.

title: Implement dark mode theme
description: Add dark mode support across the application with proper color schemes and user preference persistence.

title: Refactor notification system
description: Modernize the notification system architecture to support real-time updates and better user experience.

title: A/B test checkout flow variations
description: Set up and run A/B tests for three different checkout flow designs to optimize conversion rates.

title: Migrate legacy data to new schema
description: Plan and execute migration of historical data from legacy system to new database schema with zero downtime.

title: Launch beta testing program
description: Coordinate beta testing program with selected users, including feedback collection and bug reporting workflows.
